1_card.title: HEALTH, SAFETY, AND GOOD MOOD
1_card.description: Our mission is to ensure your child's health and positive emotions. Each child in our school works with a personal coach. Lessons are held in an individual format so that children feel as comfortable and safe as possible.

2_question.question: How long is the lesson?
2_question.answer: Each session lasts 45 minutes. For toddlers, the lesson duration may be shortened to 30 minutes.

3_question.question: How often should we go to the pool?
3_question.answer: We recommend attending 2‚Äì3 sessions per week. This consistency allows for excellent progress within the first few months. If attendance becomes irregular, the habit may break, and your child could require another adaptation period.

4_question.question: Safety during training
4_question.answer: At our swim school, your child‚Äôs safety is the top priority. All training is supervised by qualified coaches with experience working with children and ensuring comfort and safety in the water. We use modern equipment and maintain the pool's cleanliness at a high standard. For young children, lessons are held in shallow water, and beginner swimmers are supported with floatation devices. Groups are formed based on age and skill level so each child receives proper attention and support. Coaches provide mandatory safety briefings before each session and teach essential water safety skills that are useful not only during lessons but also in real life. With us, your child is in safe hands and will enjoy swimming in a secure and friendly environment.
